name: Atombois Colega
description:
Atombois Colega

A bizarre bastard child between agar.io and asteroids, with some slight touches of neon.

=============                CONTROLS                ===============================

WASD --> Movement.

SPACE --> Shoot.

MOUSE --> Aim.

============             PREMADE ASSETS              ============================

texturegenerator.com to create the textures.

SONG:

Raydar - Neon Graffiti
